@Obleo_1 @blueandme @MdBreathe @HEB It is virtually impossible to overdose on ivermectin – it is one of the safest drugs in the pharmacopoeia. Named doctors are using it and saving thousands of lives. Im unvaccinated and took it myself when I had Covid (with zinc and Vits C and D) and was fine after 24hrs.

Many people with unsound minds will take ivermectin as an alternative to vaccination, so yes, ivermectin can kill.
